desc.cn: 该据点滩多流急。行动迅捷的干员，能够更好地利用河流移动，提升建设效率。
desc.en: This outpost is known having fast flowing rivers and broken shores. Agile operators can move around along the rivers and improve construction efficiency.

desc.cn: 该据点需要大量采集环境样本。熟悉当地自然条件的干员，能够更熟练地协助准备工作。
desc.en: This outpost needs plenty of environmental samples. Operators well-versed in the local wilderness can prepare and conduct various tasks more effectively.

desc.cn: 该据点周边常有裂地者游荡。作战技巧丰富的干员，能够协助抵御潜在的威胁。
desc.en: Landbreakers are often found loitering around this outpost. Operators who are skilled combatants can help defend the outpost against potential threats.

desc.cn: 该据点需要稳固可靠的应急建筑。经常与难民们打交道的罗德岛干员，能够提升据点的建设效率。
desc.en: This outpost needs a reliable SAR facility. Rhodes Island operators who often deal with disaster refugees can accelerate the development of this outpost.

desc.cn: 该据点经常陷入物资短缺的处境。极具创意的干员能够提升该据点工人们对仅有物资的处置能力。
desc.en: This outpost is often short on resource. Operators who are creative can improve supply usage efficiency of the outpost crew.

desc.cn: 该据点常处在危险的环境中。可以基于不同环境特点进行局势分析的干员，能够提升该据点的生产效率。
desc.en: This outpost often finds itself in danger. Operators who are skilled in analyzing environmental situations and risks can boost outpost productivity.

desc.cn: 该据点存在复杂的综合需求。擅长与其他组织合作的终末地工业干员，能够改善该据点的分工效能。
desc.en: This outpost has all sorts of complicated environments. Endfield operators skilled in working with other organizations can improve the division of labor of this outpost.

desc.cn: 该据点需要建设大量设备。对现有科技具备独到见解的干员，能够加快该据点的建设速度。
desc.en: Plenty of facilities must be built in this outpost. Operators with deep insights of existing technology can help speed up the construction of this outpost.

desc.cn: 该据点的工业生产正面临瓶颈。干员在协助工业生产时的灵光一闪，能够提升该据点的生产效率。
desc.en: This outpost is facing a bottleneck in industrial production. Operators who can offer flashes of inspiration during industrial manufacturing can boost outpost productivity.

desc.cn: 该据点引入了大量的精密源石设备。可以根据不同精密源石设备动态调整生产方案的罗德岛干员，能够提升该据点的建设效率。
desc.en: This outpost has introduced plenty of precision Originium machinery. Rhodes Island operators who can dynamically adjust production plans of these precision Originium machinery will help accelerate the development of this outpost.

desc.cn: 该据点具备比较独特的文化氛围。当干员拥有深厚的文化底蕴时，能够提升该据点的生产效率。
desc.en: This outpost has a unique cultural atmosphere. Operators with extensive cultural upbringing can boost outpost productivity.

desc.cn: 使用源石技艺可以加快该据点受损设备的修复速度。精通源石技艺的干员，能够提升该据点的生产效率。
desc.en: Originium Arts can be used to speed up repair work for the damaged facilities in this outpost. Operators skilled in the Arts can boost outpost productivity.
